apis.name: List merge requests
apis.description: Get all merge requests the authenticated user has access to. By default it returns only merge requests created by the current user. To get all merge requests, use parameter scope=all.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Return all merge requests or just those that are opened, closed, locked, or merged.

attributes.name: order_by
attributes.description: Return requests ordered by created_at, title, or updated_at fields. Default is created_at. Introduced in GitLab 14.8.

attributes.name: sort
attributes.description: Return requests sorted in asc or desc order. Default is desc.

attributes.name: milestone
attributes.description: Return merge requests for a specific milestone. None returns merge requests with no milestone. Any returns merge requests that have an assigned milestone.

attributes.name: view
attributes.description: If simple, returns the iid, URL, title, description, and basic state of merge request.

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: Return merge requests matching a comma-separated list of labels. None lists all merge requests with no labels. Any lists all merge requests with at least one label. Predefined names are case-insensitive.

attributes.name: with_labels_details
attributes.description: If true, response returns more details for each label in labels field: :name, :color, :description, :description_html, :text_color. Default is false. Introduced in GitLab 12.7.

attributes.name: with_merge_status_recheck
attributes.description: If true, this projection requests (but does not guarantee) that the merge_status field be recalculated asynchronously. Default is false. Introduced in GitLab 13.0.

attributes.name: created_after
attributes.description: Return merge requests created on or after the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: created_before
attributes.description: Return merge requests created on or before the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: updated_after
attributes.description: Return merge requests updated on or after the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: updated_before
attributes.description: Return merge requests updated on or before the given time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: Return merge requests for the given scope: created_by_me, assigned_to_me or all. Defaults to created_by_me.

attributes.name: author_id
attributes.description: Returns merge requests created by the given user id. Mutually exclusive with author_username. Combine with scope=all or scope=assigned_to_me.

attributes.name: author_username
attributes.description: Returns merge requests created by the given username. Mutually exclusive with author_id. Introduced in GitLab 12.10.

attributes.name: assignee_id
attributes.description: Returns merge requests assigned to the given user id. None returns unassigned merge requests. Any returns merge requests with an assignee.

attributes.name: approver_ids
attributes.description: Returns merge requests which have specified all the users with the given ids as individual approvers. None returns merge requests without approvers. Any returns merge requests with an approver.

attributes.name: approved_by_ids
attributes.description: Returns merge requests which have been approved by all the users with the given ids (Max: 5). None returns merge requests with no approvals. Any returns merge requests with an approval.

attributes.name: reviewer_id
attributes.description: Returns merge requests which have the user as a reviewer with the given user id. None returns merge requests with no reviewers. Any returns merge requests with any reviewer. Mutually exclusive with reviewer_username.

attributes.name: reviewer_username
attributes.description: Returns merge requests which have the user as a reviewer with the given username. None returns merge requests with no reviewers. Any returns merge requests with any reviewer. Mutually exclusive with reviewer_id. Introduced in GitLab 13.8.

attributes.name: my_reaction_emoji
attributes.description: Return merge requests reacted by the authenticated user by the given emoji. None returns issues not given a reaction. Any returns issues given at least one reaction.

attributes.name: source_branch
attributes.description: Return merge requests with the given source branch.

attributes.name: target_branch
attributes.description: Return merge requests with the given target branch.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Search merge requests against their title and description.

attributes.name: in
attributes.description: Modify the scope of the search attribute. title, description, or a string joining them with comma. Default is title,description.

attributes.name: wip
attributes.description: Filter merge requests against their wip status. yes to return only draft merge requests, no to return non-draft merge requests.

attributes.name: not
attributes.description: Return merge requests that do not match the parameters supplied. Accepts: labels, milestone, author_id, author_username, assignee_id, assignee_username, reviewer_id, reviewer_username, my_reaction_emoji.

attributes.name: environment
attributes.description: Returns merge requests deployed to the given environment.

attributes.name: deployed_before
attributes.description: Return merge requests deployed before the given date/time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

attributes.name: deployed_after
attributes.description: Return merge requests deployed after the given date/time. Expected in ISO 8601 format (2019-03-15T08:00:00Z)

milestone.title: v2.0
milestone.description: Assumenda aut placeat expedita exercitationem labore sunt enim earum.

apis.name: List project merge requests
apis.description: project_id represents the ID of the project where the MR resides. project_id always equals target_project_id.

attributes.name: updated_before

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: Return merge requests for the given scope: created_by_me, assigned_to_me, or all.

attributes.name: author_id
attributes.description: Returns merge requests created by the given user id. Mutually exclusive with author_username.

attributes.name: author_username

attributes.name: approver_ids

attributes.name: reviewer_username

attributes.name: my_reaction_emoji
attributes.description: Return merge requests reacted by the authenticated user by the given emoji. None returns issues not given a reaction. Any returns issues given at least one reaction.

attributes.name: source_branch
attributes.description: Return merge requests with the given source branch.

attributes.name: target_branch
attributes.description: Return merge requests with the given target branch.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Search merge requests against their title and description.

attributes.name: wip
attributes.description: Filter merge requests against their wip status. yes to return only draft merge requests, no to return non-draft merge requests.

attributes.name: not
attributes.description: Return merge requests that do not match the parameters supplied. Accepts: labels, milestone, author_id, author_username, assignee_id, assignee_username, reviewer_id, reviewer_username, my_reaction_emoji.

attributes.name: environment

apis.name: List group merge requests
apis.description: group_id represents the ID of the group which contains the project where the MR resides.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the group owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: state

apis.name: Get single MR
apis.description: Shows information about a single merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.name: render_html
attributes.description: If true response includes rendered HTML for title and description.

attributes.name: include_diverged_commits_count
attributes.description: If true response includes the commits behind the target branch.

attributes.name: include_rebase_in_progress
attributes.description: If true response includes whether a rebase operation is in progress.

apis.name: Get single MR participants
apis.description: Get a list of merge request participants.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid

attributes.name: access_raw_diffs
attributes.description: Retrieve change diffs via Gitaly.

apis.name: List MR pipelines
apis.description: Get a list of merge request pipelines.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Create MR Pipeline
apis.description: Create a new pipeline for a merge request. A pipeline created via this endpoint doesnt run a regular branch/tag pipeline. It requires .gitlab-ci.yml to be configured with only: [merge_requests] to create jobs.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Create MR
apis.description: Creates a new merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: source_branch
attributes.description: The source branch.

attributes.name: target_branch
attributes.description: The target branch.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of MR.

attributes.name: assignee_id
attributes.description: Assignee user ID.

attributes.name: assignee_ids
attributes.description: The ID of the users to assign the MR to. Set to 0 or provide an empty value to unassign all assignees.

attributes.name: reviewer_ids
attributes.description: The ID of the users added as a reviewer to the MR. If set to 0 or left empty, no reviewers are added. Introduced in GitLab 13.8.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of MR. Limited to 1,048,576 characters.

attributes.name: target_project_id
attributes.description: The target project (numeric ID).

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: Labels for MR as a comma-separated list.

attributes.name: milestone_id
attributes.description: The global ID of a milestone.

attributes.name: remove_source_branch
attributes.description: Flag indicating if a merge request should remove the source branch when merging.

attributes.name: allow_collaboration
attributes.description: Allow commits from members who can merge to the target branch.

attributes.name: allow_maintainer_to_push
attributes.description: Alias of allow_collaboration.

attributes.name: approvals_before_merge
attributes.description: Number of approvals required before this can be merged (see below).

attributes.name: squash
attributes.description: Squash commits into a single commit when merging.

milestone.title: v2.0
milestone.description: Assumenda aut placeat expedita exercitationem labore sunt enim earum.

apis.name: Update MR
apis.description: Updates an existing merge request. You can change the target branch, title, or even close the MR.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The ID of a merge request.

attributes.name: target_branch
attributes.description: The target branch.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of MR.

attributes.name: assignee_id
attributes.description: The ID of the user to assign the merge request to. Set to 0 or provide an empty value to unassign all assignees.

attributes.name: assignee_ids
attributes.description: The ID of the users to assign the MR to. Set to 0 or provide an empty value to unassign all assignees.

attributes.name: reviewer_ids
attributes.description: The ID of the users set as a reviewer to the MR. Set the value to 0 or provide an empty value to unset all reviewers. Introduced in GitLab 13.8.

attributes.name: milestone_id
attributes.description: The global ID of a milestone to assign the merge request to. Set to 0 or provide an empty value to unassign a milestone.

attributes.name: labels
attributes.description: Comma-separated label names for a merge request. Set to an empty string to unassign all labels.

attributes.name: add_labels
attributes.description: Comma-separated label names to add to a merge request.

attributes.name: remove_labels
attributes.description: Comma-separated label names to remove from a merge request.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of MR. Limited to 1,048,576 characters.

attributes.name: state_event
attributes.description: New state (close/reopen).

attributes.name: remove_source_branch
attributes.description: Flag indicating if a merge request should remove the source branch when merging.

attributes.name: squash
attributes.description: Squash commits into a single commit when merging.

attributes.name: discussion_locked
attributes.description: Flag indicating if the merge requests discussion is locked. If the discussion is locked only project members can add, edit or resolve comments.

attributes.name: allow_collaboration
attributes.description: Allow commits from members who can merge to the target branch.

attributes.name: allow_maintainer_to_push
attributes.description: Alias of allow_collaboration.

milestone.title: v2.0

apis.name: Delete a merge request
apis.description: Only for administrators and project owners. Deletes the merge request in question.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Merge a merge request
apis.description: Accept and merge changes submitted with MR using this API.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.name: merge_commit_message
attributes.description: Custom merge commit message.

attributes.name: squash_commit_message
attributes.description: Custom squash commit message.

attributes.name: squash
attributes.description: If true the commits are squashed into a single commit on merge.

attributes.name: should_remove_source_branch
attributes.description: If true removes the source branch.

attributes.name: merge_when_pipeline_succeeds
attributes.description: If true the MR is merged when the pipeline succeeds.

attributes.name: sha
attributes.description: If present, then this SHA must match the HEAD of the source branch, otherwise the merge fails.

apis.name: Merge to default merge ref path
apis.description: Merge the changes between the merge request source and target branches into refs/merge-requests/:iid/merge ref, of the target project repository, if possible. This ref has the state the target branch would have if a regular merge action was taken.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Subscribe to a merge request
apis.description: Subscribes the authenticated user to a merge request to receive notification. If the user is already subscribed to the merge request, the status code HTTP 304 Not Modified is returned.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Unsubscribe from a merge request
apis.description: Unsubscribes the authenticated user from a merge request to not receive notifications from that merge request. If the user is not subscribed to the merge request, the status code HTTP 304 Not Modified is returned.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Create a to-do item
apis.description: Manually creates a to-do item for the current user on a merge request. If there already exists a to-do item for the user on that merge request, status code HTTP 304 Not Modified is returned.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

apis.name: Get a single MR diff version
apis.description: Get a single merge request diff version. For an explanation of the SHAs in the response, read SHAs in the API response.

attributes.description: The ID of the project.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.name: version_id
attributes.description: The ID of the merge request diff version.

apis.name: Set a time estimate for a merge request
apis.description: Sets an estimated time of work for this merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: The duration in human format, such as 3h30m.

apis.name: Reset the time estimate for a merge request
apis.description: Resets the estimated time for this merge request to 0 seconds.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of a projects merge_request.

apis.name: Add spent time for a merge request
apis.description: Adds spent time for this merge request.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: merge_request_iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the merge request.

attributes.name: duration
